puns: CUPOW! I’m here to help you
Im Cuppy from Cuptown and im coming to help you
Whats Cup, do you need any Help?

routerHelper.helperText: These are some things I can help you with

configHelper.helperText: Our catalogue has a lot to offer, so why don't you start with a premade configuration

heightHelper.helperText: While you put up your closet after it has been built it should be small enough for your room. Just tell me how high your room is in the first field and what the dimensions of your largest closet will be in the second field. I'll tell you wether it fits
heightHelper.dontFit: It doesn't fit try a smaller one!

recommendationHelper.helperText: Looks like you don't know what to do. Why not try do configure some {item}

tourHelper.tourStart: I'm your personal cupboard assistant and I'm the mascot of the cyberspace-presence of Cupboard Ltd.. Why not join me on a tour of the website?
tourHelper.tourLoc: Great that you're coming with me. This is your location selector, if you're from somewhere else, than I thought you can change this here.
tourHelper.tourLang: ¿No hablas ingles? No problem you can select another language here and believe me I speak a lot of them
tourHelper.tourImprint: Ah the Imprint,  it's boring but important. Here you find all the information about legal regulations. Like for example that we don't save any cookies, how cool is that?
tourHelper.tourAbout: Uhh Berlin, this is where I live and this is also where Cupboard Ltd. has it's HQ. If you wan't to know more about us you can find it in the about section
tourHelper.tourCatalogue: Here is the catalogue, you can find and buy a selection of our products here
tourHelper.tourTool: Now to my favourite part: The customization tool, you can customize your closet all by yourself and there's even a 3D-Model of it. ISN'T THAT AWESOME?
tourHelper.tourEnd: Wowsers, great that you took the Tour. Now have fun on our website!
